description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国河南省下辖的地级市，位于河南省东北部，是国家重要的石油化工基地和商品粮生产基地。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in the northeastern part of Henan Province, People's Republic of China. It is a major petrochemical base and commodity grain production base in the country.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国共产党濮阳市委员会书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Secretary of the Puyang Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任濮阳市人民代表大会常务委员会主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Director of the Standing Committee of the Puyang Municipal People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任濮阳市人民政府市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Mayor of the Puyang Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国人民政治协商会议濮阳市委员会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Chairman of the Puyang Municipal Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

nodes.id: 中国共产党濮阳市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党濮阳市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在濮阳市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Puyang City.

nodes.id: 濮阳市人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 濮阳市人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 濮阳市的国家权力机关。
description.en: The organ of state power in Puyang City.

description.zh-cn: 濮阳市的行政管理机关。
description.en: The administrative management body of Puyang City.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议濮阳市委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议濮阳市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议在濮阳市的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference in Puyang City.

description.zh-cn: 五代时期后周的建立者，后周太祖。
description.en: Founder of the Later Zhou dynasty during the Five Dynasties period, Emperor Taizu of Later Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 950年，郭威在澶州（今濮阳）被军士拥立为帝，建立后周的历史事件。
description.en: A historical event in 950 where Guo Wei was acclaimed emperor by his troops in Chanzhou (modern Puyang), leading to the establishment of the Later Zhou dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 北宋时期的政治家、宰相。
description.en: A politician and chancellor of the Northern Song dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 北宋的第三位皇帝。
description.en: The third emperor of the Northern Song dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 北宋与辽国于1004年在澶州（今濮阳）签订的盟约，开启了两国百余年的和平。
description.en: A treaty signed between the Northern Song and Liao dynasties in 1004 in Chanzhou (modern Puyang), which initiated over a century of peace between the two states.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上由契丹族建立的朝代。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history established by the Khitan people.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上继五代十国之后的朝代。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history that followed the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家，通常简称为中国。
description.en: A country in East Asia, commonly known as China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期设立的一个省级行政区，1952年被撤销。
description.en: A former province established in the early years of the People's Republic of China, abolished in 1952.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期设立的专区，1954年被撤销。
description.en: A former prefecture established in the early years of the People's Republic of China, abolished in 1954.

description.zh-cn: 原安阳专区，1983年被撤销。
description.en: Formerly Anyang Prefecture, it was abolished in 1983.

description.zh-cn: 濮阳市下辖的县。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Puyang City.

description.zh-cn: 相传为黄帝时期造字的史官，被尊为“造字圣人”。
description.en: A legendary figure in ancient China, claimed to be an official historian of the Yellow Emperor and the inventor of Chinese characters.

description.zh-cn: 濮阳市下辖的县。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Puyang City.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代传说中的部落联盟首领，“三皇五帝”中的五帝之首。
description.en: A legendary Chinese sovereign and cultural hero, considered the first of the Five Emperors in the 'Three Sovereigns and Five Emperors'.

relationships.target: 中国共产党濮阳市委员会

description.zh-cn: 2023年3月，万正峰就任中国共产党濮阳市委员会书记。
description.en: In March 2023, Wan Zhengfeng took office as the Secretary of the Puyang Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 濮阳市人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 2021年3月，邵景良就任濮阳市人民代表大会常务委员会主任。
description.en: In March 2021, Shao Jingliang took office as the Director of the Standing Committee of the Puyang Municipal People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 2023年3月，朱良才就任濮阳市人民政府市长。
description.en: In March 2023, Zhu Liangcai took office as the Mayor of the Puyang Municipal People's Government.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议濮阳市委员会

description.zh-cn: 2021年2月，徐慧前就任中国人民政治协商会议濮阳市委员会主席。
description.en: In February 2021, Xu Huiqian took office as the Chairman of the Puyang Municipal Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 郭威在澶州兵变中被军士拥立为帝，从而建立了后周。
description.en: During the military coup at Chanzhou, Guo Wei was acclaimed emperor by his troops, which led to the establishment of the Later Zhou dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 在辽国入侵期间，寇准力谏宋真宗御驾亲征至澶州，稳定了军心。
description.en: During the Liao invasion, Kou Zhun strongly advised Emperor Zhenzong to personally lead the campaign to Chanzhou, which stabilized the army's morale.

description.zh-cn: 宋真宗御驾亲征至澶州，促成了宋辽双方签订澶渊之盟。
description.en: Emperor Zhenzong's personal presence in the campaign at Chanzhou facilitated the signing of the Treaty of Chanyuan between the Song and Liao dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 1004年，辽国军队兵临澶州与北宋交战，战败后求和，双方的敌对状态以《澶渊之盟》的签订而告终。
description.en: In 1004, the Liao army besieged Chanzhou and fought against the Northern Song. After being defeated, they sued for peace, ending the state of hostility with the signing of the Treaty of Chanyuan.

description.zh-cn: 《澶渊之盟》的签订，促使北宋与辽国进入了长达百余年的和平时期。
description.en: The signing of the Treaty of Chanyuan pushed the Northern Song and the Liao dynasty into a period of peace that lasted for over a century.

description.zh-cn: 《澶渊之盟》的签订，促使辽国与北宋进入了长达百余年的和平时期。
description.en: The signing of the Treaty of Chanyuan pushed the Liao dynasty and the Northern Song into a period of peace that lasted for over a century.

description.zh-cn: 1952年，中华人民共和国中央人民政府决定撤销平原省建制。
description.en: In 1952, the Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China decided to abolish Pingyuan Province.

description.zh-cn: 1954年，中华人民共和国决定撤销濮阳专区。
description.en: In 1954, the People's Republic of China decided to abolish Puyang Prefecture.

description.zh-cn: 1983年9月1日，中华人民共和国国务院批准设立地级濮阳市。
description.en: On September 1, 1983, the State Council of the People's Republic of China approved the establishment of the prefecture-level city of Puyang.

description.zh-cn: 根据记载，仓颉是今南乐县吴村人。
description.en: According to records, Cangjie was from Wucun, in modern-day Nanle County.

description.zh-cn: 仓颉是黄帝时期造字的史官。
description.en: Cangjie was the historian official of the Yellow Emperor who invented Chinese characters.
